choices: He jumps in the air and butt slams the mouse paper thin.
He belly flops onto the mouse, squashing it paper thin.
1132.content: One day Skunk was walking around the place just doing nothing and relaxing enjoying the air when he just noticed a small mouse just walking around. He suddenly just then got an idea...
1132.title: Flattening

choices: it's flattened on the ground paper thin.
11321.content: He squats down for a moment then leaps into the air, lifts his legs out in front of him, and then drops down onto the mouse hard butt first making a thump sound and a small squishing sound. He butt grinds for a bit then gets up and looks at the mouse behind him.
11321.title: Squashed mouse

131.title: Inflation

13111.content: (Fox was training it was dawn so fox decided to train early. (5 hours later) fox was done training so she decided to meditate when she was about to meditate she saw a strange tank when she inspected it she then found out that it was a helium tank "a helium tank ? Hmm i heard this makes your voice sound funny. I guess it wouldn't hurt to try". She put the hose in her mouth and turned on the tank but nothing happened the twised the switch more still nothing happened "maybe there's a lee-Mmph !?!" fox was surprised by the cold gas that entered her throat, she pulled the hose out and turned off the tank "oh my gosh that was col-eep !" she clamped her paws over her mouth suprised that her voice gained a higher pitch. She liked it, she sang with a high pitched voice "(chuckles) that was fun" her voice sounding almost normal meaning her voice was going back to normal, unbeknownst to fox someone put glue on the end of the hose fox put the hose in her mouth again. When she decided that was long enough she went to pull the hose out her mouth it was stuck she went to turn the tank off but the switch broke off " uh oh " she started feeling bloated she looked down and saw her body expanding she desperately tried to pull the hose out but it was still stuck. (2 hours later) fox was round as a ball she felt her skin tightening "uh oh i think I'm about to reach my bursting point" fox was crying and praying for a little bit of luck then she heard the hissing stop she was happy that she was alive but she still had one problem she was still a big giant orange ball "how will this get worse ?" Then she...
13111.title: A (not-so) ordinary day

choices: a thorn patch and/or a tree with sharp branches
131111.content: She wondered if how this could be worse than she started floating. "darn I forgot this makes stuff float" she started to float up over the tree she was going to meditate by then she started to float up as high as the clouds but then something tugged the hose. The tank was still stuck on the hose "thank goodness it's still stuck" but unbeknownst to fox someone pulled the hose off the tank. "Wait why am I floating away from the tree ?" Fox started to float where the wind was carrying her, she was floating home. "I'm floating towards my home" but then the wind carried her towards..
131111.title: A flying fox

1311111.content: Tree with sharp branches or thorn patch ?
1311111.title: A pointy choice

choices: she was popped on one of the branches
13111111.content: Fox started to float towards a tree with sharp branches, "hopefully i wont be popped on one of the branches". She tried to dodge the sharp branches thinking that one wrong move could spell her doom, fox was almost on the other side then..
13111111.title: A sharp situation

131111111.content: Fox almost got to the other side of the tree but then she felt something sharp poking one of her buttcheeks, "ow ! What is poking my behind ?". Before fox could look "PAP!!!" Fox felt all the helium inside her go out of the hole made by a sharp branch. " This is embarrassing !!" Fox thought as she blushed as she flew towards her home like a deflating balloon. (A few minutes later) fox was at her home, as she was at her home she ran out of helium then fell to the ground like a deflated balloon. "How am i going to get inside ?", Then..
131111111.title: A deflation problem

15.content: Here are my original characters that you can choose from or you can choose another character.
15.title: More Character

info.brief_description: If you gre up between 2000-2016 you my know the show Skunk fu on KidsWB.
info.description:
This is a little interactive of the TV show "Skunk Fu" as the characters you the readers can pick who's story you want to do, or you can have a group of two of what ever is listed in the choices you pick. Now this interactive has our hero's & villains going through some rather interesting transformations like:

Inflation's
Weight Gains
Flattening's {example: #1 https://postimg.org/image/7juw2ri5b/ #2 https://postimg.org/image/q0patky3j/ and more}
Anthro/Feral
Object transformation's {example: #1 https://postimg.org/image/nfjq628pr/ #2 https://postimg.org/image/3yz0jjdlr/ and many more}
Food transformation's {example: #1 https://postimg.org/image/sw2e0g23j/ #2 https://postimg.org/image/68n4uamjj/ and more}

Now you can bring in Oc's (Own Characters) into the Interactive.
Though do keep the story long, don't wight something so short in a chapter for example "then he got up out of bed and walked to the door" then move to the next chapter. Give the chapter some life to it.

Now there are only these things that are not aloud:
1
{footnote:#2}Gas, except for Skunk. since he's a skunk.

I will update this when there are updates to be made, so in the mean time Enjoy the interactive and have fun!

Footnotes
1  Bathroom related things. you know what I mean.
